events.title: Abundant Catch
events.description: The nets are overflowing! The fishermen have brought in a magnificent haul.

events.title: Fierce Storm
events.description: A terrible storm lashes the village. Work is disrupted and supplies are damaged.

events.title: Clear Day in the Forest
events.description: Perfect weather for woodcutting. Your workers are efficient and spirits are high.

events.title: Work Accident
events.description: A villager is injured while working. The village rallies to help, but work slows.

events.title: Northern Lights
events.description: The aurora dances across the sky. Your people take it as a good omen.

events.title: Draugr Spotted
events.description: The undead have been seen near the village. Fear grips your people.

events.title: Abandoned Cache
events.description: Your people discover supplies left by travelers. Fortune smiles upon you!

events.title: Elder's Wisdom
events.description: You share stories of the old ways. Your people feel connected to their heritage.

events.title: Wolf Pack
events.description: Wolves prowl near the village. Some food stores are lost to keep them at bay.

events.title: Mild Weather
events.description: The weather is unusually mild. Work proceeds smoothly.

events.title: Tools Break
events.description: Essential tools are damaged and need repair. Productivity suffers.

events.title: Village Feast
events.description: The villagers hold a small celebration to maintain spirits. Food is consumed, but morale soars.
